statements: SELECT * FROM money_transfers;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, amount, transfer_date FROM money_transfers;
SELECT * FROM money_transfers WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, transfer_date FROM money_transfers WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT transfer_id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount, transfer_date, status FROM money_transfers ORDER BY transfer_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM money_transfers WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transfer_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transfer_id, sender_id, receiver_id, amount FROM money_transfers WHERE status = 'completed' AND amount < 500 ORDER BY amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM money_transfers GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id HAVING total_amount > 2000;
SELECT transfer_id, status FROM money_transfers WHERE status IN ('pending', 'processing') ORDER BY status, transfer_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, transfer_date FROM money_transfers WHERE sender_id = '01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef' AND receiver_id = 'fedcba98-7654-3210-fedc-ba9876543210' ORDER BY transfer_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, balance FROM customers WHERE balance < 0 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, recipient_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount >= 500 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email, balance FROM customers WHERE balance < 5000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT c.name, t.amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.sender_id WHERE t.amount > 1000 ORDER BY t.timestamp DESC;

SELECT c.name AS sender, c2.name AS recipient, t.amount FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.sender_id JOIN customers c2 ON t.recipient_id = c2.customer_id WHERE t.timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY t.amount DESC;
SELECT c.name, SUM(t.amount) AS total_sent FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.sender_id GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY total_sent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_balance > 500;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_balance FROM customers WHERE customer_balance < 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_balance > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_balance FROM customers WHERE customer_balance < 500 OR customer_balance > 3000 ORDER BY customer_balance DESC, customer_name ASC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, c.customer_name, t.amount, tl.log_description FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON c.customer_id = t.sender_id JOIN transaction_logs tl ON tl.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE t.amount > 100 ORDER BY tl.log_timestamp DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name AS sender_name, c.customer_email AS sender_email, t.amount, c2.customer_name AS receiver_name, c2.customer_email AS receiver_email FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.sender_id JOIN customers c2 ON c2.customer_id = t.receiver_id WHERE t.amount > 500 ORDER BY t.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM Customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Accounts ORDER BY date_opened DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT source_account_id, destination_account_id, amount FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM Customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT account_id, account_balance FROM Accounts ORDER BY date_opened DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND log_timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = '2c82e6b7-3f0e-4b3f-b9cb-033c61a1ba98';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(balance) AS highest_balance FROM Accounts GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT account_id, balance, currency FROM Accounts WHERE balance > 1000.00 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, from_account_id, to_account_id, amount FROM Transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM Security WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY username;
